title: STK Toronto has schedule change
statement: STK Toronto changes its operating hours beginning February 15th from its previous schedule.

citations.quote: Until 2/15 Monday – Thursday: 4pm – 11pm Friday: 3pm – 12am Saturday: 11am – 12am Sunday: 11am – 11pm Beginning 2/15 Sunday – Thursday: 3pm – 11pm Friday & Saturday: 3pm – 12am
